```{r}
beta <- readRDS("../../Komanda/output/betab.rds")

```

```{r}
#libraries
if(!require("VennDiagram"))install.packages("VennDiagram")
library(VennDiagram)

library(RColorBrewer)

```


```{r}
dim(data)
dim(anno)
dim(sample)

unique(sample$tissue_region)
```


```{r}
unique(sample$tissue_region)
crb <- sample$sample_id[sample$tissue_region == "CRB"]
dlpfc <- sample$sample_id[sample$tissue_region == "DLPFC"]
erc <- sample$sample_id[sample$tissue_region == "ERC"]
hippo <- sample$sample_id[sample$tissue_region == "HIPPO"]
#beta <- beta[1:1000,]


crb <- c(beta[,crb])
dlpfc <- c(beta[, dlpfc])
erc <- c(beta[, erc])
hippo <- c(beta[,hippo])

```


```{r}

myCol <- brewer.pal(4, "Set1")

futile.logger::flog.threshold(futile.logger::ERROR, name = "VennDiagramLogger")

plt <- venn.diagram(
  x = list(crb, dlpfc, erc, hippo),
  category.names = c("CRB","DLPFC","ERC","HIPPO"),
  filename = NULL,
  #output=TRUE
  #imagetype="png" ,
  height = 480 , 
  width = 480 , 
  resolution = 300,
  compression = "lzw",
  
  # Circles
  lwd = 4,
  lty = 'blank',
  col= myCol,
  fill = myCol,
  
  # Numbers
  cex = 1,
  fontface = "bold",
  fontfamily = "sans",
  cat.col = myCol,
  
)

```

```{r}
grid.newpage()
grid.draw(plt)
```

```{r}

myCol <- brewer.pal(3, "Set2")
myCol <- myCol[1:2]

case <- sample$age[sample$sample == "Control"]
control <- sample$age[sample$sample != "Control"]
```
